text:
e="preserve">"Jason X" is a 2001 American science fiction slasher movie produced and directed by James Isaac. It is the tenth installment in the "Friday the 13th" movie series. It stars Kane Hodder in his fourth and final movie appearance as the undead mass murderer Jason Voorhees being in space.
It received strong negative reviews with a 19% on Rotten Tomatoes. Roger Ebert gave the movie 0.5 stars out of 4, quoting one of the movie's lines: "This sucks on so many levels."
